Token.Abstract: TDAdLoader loads a Triton ad from an ad request.
Loads an ad asynchronously from a request string. The string can be built manually by following Triton Digital On-Demand advertising guide or by the help of TDAdRequestURLBuilder class (recommended).

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: A NSString containing the request with the targeting parameters.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: a block that will execute when the request is finished, with the ad loaded or an error object.

Token.Abstract: Loads an ad asynchronously directly from a TDAdRequestURLBuilder.

Parameter.Name: builder
Parameter.Abstract: A TDAdRequestURLBuilder containing the request with the targeting parameters.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: a block that will execute when the request is finished, with the ad loaded or an error object.
